channel.title: [508 HD-Client] error_game_js5connect
channel.description:
Hello, i had follow the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327545.0.html]HD-Tutorial[/url], but I always recive this Error message when I start Josh's HD 508 Client: error_game_js5connect How can I fix it? And whats the cache508 Folder? I just had runescape, random.dat and uninstall?! I want to play :|
mfg kev
Edit: I use the Localhost-IP and the newest JDK. I had changed the Paths in build.bat and run.bat:
[code]@echo off @echo wait espeon source compiling cd ../src echo Compiling net.com.espeon.net.codec "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/net/codec/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.update "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/update/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.items "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/items/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.misc "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/misc/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.combat "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/combat/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.io "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/io/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.io.packethandler "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/io/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.net "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/net/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.util "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/util/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.world.mapdata "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.world.items "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/world/items/*.java pause[/code]
[code]@echo off @echo server loading please wait... cd ../build "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\java.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 pause exit[/code]

is your server online? if it isnt run it, then in the ip box type 0.0.0.0

item.title: [508 HD-Client] error_game_js5connect
item.dc:creator: @kevinhuynh kevinhuynh
item.description:
@kevinhuynh wrote:

Hello,
i had follow the HD-Tutorial, but I always recive this Error message when I start Josh’s HD 508 Client: error_game_js5connect
How can I fix it? And whats the cache508 Folder? I just had runescape, random.dat and uninstall?! I want to play

mfg kev

Edit: I use the Localhost-IP and the newest JDK. I had changed the Paths in build.bat and run.bat:

@echo off @echo wait espeon source compiling cd ../src echo Compiling net.com.espeon.net.codec "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/net/codec/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.update "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/update/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.items "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/items/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.misc "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/misc/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.combat "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/combat/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.io "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/io/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.io.packethandler "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/io/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.net "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/net/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.util "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/util/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.world.mapdata "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.world.items "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/world/items/*.java pause

@echo off @echo server loading please wait... cd ../build "D:\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\java.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 pause exit
